name: wind power plant construction, 2MW, offshore, moving parts | wind power plant, 2MW, offshore, moving parts | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1408/documentation

This dataset represents the moving parts of a 2 MW offshore wind power plant, based on the dimensions of an offshore wind power plant of the type Bonus 2 MW.

From pasture land forseen for the construction of a wind power plant.

This activity ends with the moving parts of a constructed wind power plant, having a lifetime of 20 years. The dataset includes apart the materials for moving parts of a wind power plant also the construction efforts and the disposal of all these parts.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Technical details of the modeled 2 MW offshore wind power plant;References:;Stiesdal H. (2001) Middelgrunden Offshore. A newsletter for customers and business associates, Bonus energy A/S. General technical description, Technical specification, Drawings and design, Bonus 2 MW offshore. Isager/Bogtryt/Offset, Svendborg, Denmark. www.bonus.dk
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data are from a plant of the type Bonus 2 MW, installed at the wind farm Middelgrunden on the coast of Denmark.

exchanges.description:
The rotor consists of rotor blades, the rotor hub and extenders. The nacelle consists of the nacelle frame carrying the mechanics and the nacelle cover. Yaw control, rotor brake and nacelle brake are hydraulically actuated. The entire hydraulic system is combined in a compact module. The electronical system for monitoring, controlling and recording data of the plant is located in the electrical cabinet at the bottom of the tower. The transformer delivers current with a voltage of 30 kV. The rotor weighs 52'000 kg, the nacelle 82'500 kg and the electrical system with the network connection 13'309 kg.
EcoSpold01Location=OCE

flow.name: wind power plant, 2MW, offshore, moving parts
flow.category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=RER
Estimation. Hydraulic oil is used for the hydraulically operated pitch, rotor brake and nacelle brake (150 kg). For the transformator 1000 kg of oil is estimated.

Further references:
Scholzen (1991): Oekobilanz von Windenergie am Beispiel einer 30 kW-Anlage auf dem Simplon. Semesterarbeit am Laboratorium f端r Energiesysteme, ETH Z端rich.

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=RER
Estimation. For the hub of the rotor 11'320 kg of cast iron is estimated. For the gear 9139 kg, the main bearing 1025 kg, for the generator 3382 kg and for the transformator 1500 kg of cast iron is used.

Further references:
Scholzen (1991): Oekobilanz von Windenergie am Beispiel einer 30 kW-Anlage auf dem Simplon. Semesterarbeit am Laboratorium f端r Energiesysteme, ETH Z端rich.
